S1.title: Talk no Jutsu
S1.description: Attack target horizontally, range 1, with ATK x1. Target's turn gauge is reset.

S2.title: Swing
S2.description: Attack target in front with ATK x0.5. Target's defense is halved.

S3.title: Rasengan
S3.description: Attack target in front with ATK x1 ignoring target's defense.

S1.title: Fish Blessing
S1.description: Heal one ally (including self) by ATK x1.

S2.title: Sakura's Fist
S2.description: Increase all allies' ATK +1 / DEF +1 for 2 turns.

S3.title: Sakura Cut Hair
S3.description: Increase all team members' SPD +2 for 2 turns.

S1.title: Big Shuriken
S1.description: Throw a shuriken with ATK x1.5 horizontally until it hit a target

S2.title: Punpaksa
S2.description: Throw a bomb with ATK x0.5 anywhere on the map.

S3.title: Fire in the Hole
S3.description: Attack all tiles horizontally, range 4, with ATK x0.5.

S1.title: You Are Weak
S1.description: Pull a character within 3 tiles horizontally toward self.

S3.title: Sorry, This is it
S3.description: Attack target with ATK x1.5. Target is pushed 1 tile away.

S1.title: Hand Tongue
S1.description: Attack target horizontally or diagonally, range 1, with ATK x1.5.

S2.title: Explosion is Art
S2.description: Throw a bomb horizontally, range 4, with ATK x0.75. Deal damage as a plus sign.

S3.title: Ultimate Art
S3.description: Attack all tiles vertically with ATK x1. All characters in the range are damaged.

S1.title: Slide Punch
S1.description: Move 2 tiles toward target then attack target with ATK x1.

S3.title: Back to reality
S3.description: Attack horizontally, range 1, with ATK x1 then moves backward 1 tile.
